body_html:
How is that? I don't think anyone can edit other people's profile.

2014-03-31 13:58 GMT+02:00 Carsten Zimmermann notifications@github.com:

Can anyone just add themselves to a company and edit the company info?

That would be no different than the current implementation, only with the
added value of letting them all point to the same company instance.

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHubhttps://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/76#issuecomment-39080148
.

| @plexus https://twitter.com/plexus | arnebrasseur.net | The Happy
Lambda https://leanpub.com/happylambda |
